name: freip-monorepo
description: Fractional Real Estate Investment Platform - Complete Monorepo
author: SYNTIANT Technologies

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:backend: cd "FREIP - Fractional Real Estate Investment Platform/backend" && npm install
scripts.install:frontend: cd "FREIP - Fractional Real Estate Investment Platform/frontend" && npm install
scripts.dev:backend: cd "FREIP - Fractional Real Estate Investment Platform/backend" && npm run dev
scripts.dev:frontend: cd "FREIP - Fractional Real Estate Investment Platform/frontend" && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: cd "FREIP - Fractional Real Estate Investment Platform/backend" && npm install
scripts.build:frontend: cd "FREIP - Fractional Real Estate Investment Platform/frontend" && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start:backend: cd "FREIP - Fractional Real Estate Investment Platform/backend" && npm start
scripts.start:frontend: cd "FREIP - Fractional Real Estate Investment Platform/frontend" && npm start
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:backend: cd "FREIP - Fractional Real Estate Investment Platform/backend" && npm test
scripts.test:frontend: cd "FREIP - Fractional Real Estate Investment Platform/frontend" && npm test
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: cd "FREIP - Fractional Real Estate Investment Platform/backend" && npm run lint
scripts.lint:frontend: cd "FREIP - Fractional Real Estate Investment Platform/frontend" && npm run lint
